title: EthCC #1 | Vitalik - "The Merge Isn't Priced In"
itunes:title: EthCC #1 | Vitalik - "The Merge Isn't Priced In"
description:
🇫🇷 Welcome to the Bankless EthCC 2022 Experience 🇫🇷

With fantastic guests from all corners of the ecosystem, this 8-part series is an exploration of crypto culture and the current state of Ethereum.

This first episode is with Vitalik himself, in which we discuss his takes on the Ethereum roadmap, developer morale as we approach the Merge, and his incomparable drip.

------
📣Rhino.Fi | Massive Mystery Airdrop
https://bit.ly/3o9trRE

------

https://bankless.cc/Arbitrum

🦁 BRAVE | THE BROWSER NATIVE WALLET
https://bankless.cc/Brave

🌉 JUNO | BRIDGE FIAT TO LAYER 2
https://bankless.cc/Juno

⚡️ ZKSYNC | THE LAYER 2 SCALING ENDGAME

------
Topics Covered:

0:00 Intro
2:30 Vitalik’s New Meta
8:45 Ethereum Builds Faster
14:27 Developer Morale
17:11 Vitalik’s Drip
18:55 The App Layer
28:08 Surviving Conferences
29:45 Improving Communities
